```{r}
# Generate some data
set.seed(123)
x <- rnorm(100, mean = 5, sd = 2)
y <- rnorm(100, mean = 6, sd = 2)

# One-sample t-test
t.test(x, mu = 0)

# Two-sample t-test
t.test(x, y)

# Paired t-test
t.test(x, y, paired = TRUE)
```

```{r}
# Generate some data
set.seed(123)
data <- data.frame(
    y = rnorm(100, mean = 5, sd = 2),
    x1 = rnorm(100, mean = 6, sd = 2),
    x2 = rnorm(100, mean = 7, sd = 2)
)

# Fit linear regression model
model <- lm(y ~ x1 + x2, data = data)

# Display results
summary(model)
```

```{r}
library(AER)
# Generate some data
set.seed(123)
n <- 100
x <- rnorm(n)
z <- rnorm(n)
y <- 1 + 2 * x + 3 * z + rnorm(n)

# Fit instrumental variables regression model
model <- ivreg(y ~ x | z)
summary(model)
```

```{r}
# Load packages
library(stargazer)

# Generate some data
set.seed(123)
n <- 100
x1 <- rnorm(n)
x2 <- rnorm(n)
y <- 1 + 2 * x1 + 3 * x2 + rnorm(n)

# Fit linear regression model
model <- lm(y ~ x1 + x2, data = data)

# Create table of regression results
stargazer(model, type = "text")
```

```{r}
# Generate some data
set.seed(123)
n <- 100
x <- rnorm(n)
y <- 1 + 2 * x + rnorm(n)

model <- lm(y ~ x)

# Create scatter plot of data
plot(x, y)

# Add regression line to plot
abline(model)

# Add points to plot
points(x, y)
```
